short_desc: Independent Living Coordinators, who have disabilities, provide peer group facilitation
description: Independent Living Coordinators who have disabilities provide peer group facilitation for consumers with empathy, share insights and information based on personal experiences, and help consumers set realistic goals for themselves. Groups operate on a drop-in basis.HAYWARD GROUP meets 1st and 3rd Friday, 2-3:30.LIVERMORE GROUP meets 2nd and 4th Wednesday, 2-3:30.
